title: uLLamirangi
sahitya:
uLLamirangi vandaruL purivAyE un padamaladoru gatiyilai arivAyE


anupallavi

  kaLLam nirai nenjan nAnE AnAlum kaNNIr shorind-unran kazhaliNai paNinNdEnE


caraNam    tapa japa yOgam shei sadguNa shIlarkku dayai purivadil unakkenna perumai
aparAdhi enaiyALa manamilA unakku azhagirkO panniru karamum vElum ayilum
